article_node.title: Heavy Savings, Light Mouse: 33% Off Razer Viper V2 Pro Gaming Mouse
article_node.summary: The Razer Viper V2 Pro is a lightweight, minimalist gaming mouse that cuts 20% of the weight of its predecessor by removing grips, side buttons, and RGB lighting, aiming to give esports players speed and control. It boasts a 25% faster connection, up to 80 hours of battery life, and a $50 discount at Newegg, making it a compelling option for gamers on a budget. Reviewers have praised its design changes as a perfect match for competitive play, awarding it an "Excellent" rating. The article highlights the mouse’s advantages in games like Overwatch 2 and Valorant and encourages readers to check out additional computer mouse deals.
